Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1993...
Traded from Los Angeles to St. Louis on 2/5/1993 (Going to LA: 2B M. Loretta. Going to STL: CF A. Brown)...
Released by St. Louis on 3/2/1993...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 3/2/1993 to a minor league deal...

Hit first career homerun on 9/20/1996, off Jeff Suppan (OAK)...
